name: Thogent
culture_notes: Riveric Dialect dominant with Coastal Tongue influences
Festival of the First Tide yearly (boat-procession)
Diet heavy on smoked/ salted river fish
Rituals tied to imported reagents and craft-specialists
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
long-range mind influence rare and banned
notes: Population unknown; small riverside cluster around a crossing
Strategic local node for upriver trade and ritual services
